response.overview: After 7 years of production since the previous work. Piecing in the daytime is also recorded, centering on Night action at midnight. It is a valuable video collection that gives you a glimpse of the world that can only be seen through the eyes of a real graffiti writer. In addition, as with the previous work, many DJs, artists, band members, etc. have provided music in terms of sound, and the images that are divided into each chapter are complemented as much as possible. In addition to the original sticker, another random sticker is included. Scratch tagging is also applied to the board surface. Main countries covered: China, Hong Kong, Thailand, South Korea, Vietnam, Malaysia, Indonesia, Philippines, Taiwan, Brazil, Chile, Japan
response.title: KILL THE CITY 2 - GRAFFITI DOCUMENT
